name: Mergetin
description:
Addicting puzzle game with simple rules.

Match three same numbers to merge them into higher number.

Merging numbers also makes empty room for new numbers which fall from top. When there is no empty room for them, game will be over.

So, make sure to merge as many numbers as possible using combos. Combos also give you extra score and fill your barrier, which will stop numbers falling for one turn.

How high number can you get? Let's find out!
